name: connect-flash
notes: Express/Connect middleware for flash messages (temporary messages stored in session across redirects). Requires stateful session storage via express-session with persistent session store. Workers is stateless - sessions must be managed externally using KV, D1, or Durable Objects. Flash messages are a traditional stateful server pattern not suited for serverless. For flash-like messages in Workers, pass messages via URL parameters, cookies, or implement custom session management with KV/Durable Objects.
errorMessage: Package connect-flash needs manual test configuration - do not use generic Object.keys() test
